page.title: 06ST. PETER'S CHURCH,BELMONT
page.content:
The Christian{religion}in Belmont is represented by St.Peter's Church,built in 1850 by Rev.Charles Wright.The first{vicar}was James Dawson who died in 1859.The present vicar has worked there for 20 years during which he has baptised 147 people,officiated at 50{marriages}and taken 61{funerals.
The spire, 120' high,with a clock and weather cock,is being re-pointed and plastering is being done. There are six cast steel bells and stained glass windows.Some of the children from Belmont ring the bells.
The vicar holds events such as Sunday School Sermons,Harvest Festivals and Easter Services.The Sunday School is not held at present because of a shortage of teachers.
